changeSet.sql: Insert into RMTLOVFIELDDETAIL values ((select max(fieldcodeid)+1 from RMTLOVFIELDDETAIL),'CAT_COAPP','Corporate','Corporate','1',1,1000,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'Approved','','','','','',0,'0');
